entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
